Census division and state or area: SOURCE: Centers for Medicare & Medicaid Services.
All hospitals: a. Critical access hospitals are included with short-stay hospitals because, though not subject to one of the Medicare inpatient hospital prospective payment systems, they essentially function as and are viewed as short-stay hospitals by their communities.
Short-stay and critical access hospitals: b. Based on total number of persons enrolled in the Hospital Insurance program as of July 1, 2014.
Other non-short-stay c: c. Other non-short-stay hospitals include long-term hospitals, psychiatric hospitals, rehabilitation hospitals, children's hospitals, and religious nonmedical institutions.
